subject: Activate your Lepta account
htmlMessage:
Hi [PH.FULLNAME]

Please click the link below to activate your account.

[PH.PROTOCOL]://[PH.DOMAIN]/auth/sign-in?token=[PH.TOKEN.QUERYENCODE]

The link will expire in 24 hours. If nothing happens after clicking, please copy and paste the link in your browser.



Thanks,
The Lepta Team
